wikipedia_page.main: Siw Hughes (born 16 January 1958) is a Welsh actress. She is best known for her role as Kath Jones in the long-running S4C soap opera, Pobol y Cwm, from 1993 to 2007, 2014 and 2017 onwards.

link_mentions.page: List of Pobol y Cwm characters
response: |Kathleen 'Kath' Pearl Jones|| Siw Hughes || 1993–2007, 2014, 2017– || Jones family matriarch, mother of Mark and Stacey.
Actress Rhian Blythe won a BAFTA Cymru Best Actress award for her role in the 2014 series of the show. Siw Hughes was nominated for the same award.
* Gemma Haddon – School Secretary (played by Siw Hughes) (series 1-5)

Ibiza, Ibiza is a 1986 Welsh comedy television film which aired on Welsh-language channel S4C. It was directed by Ronw Protheroe and stars Caryl Parry Jones, Siw Hughes, Emyr Wyn, and Huw Chiswell. It covers the stories of three women as they go on holiday to the island of Ibiza.
